snippet: A judge noted in the sentencing of Christos Bagios, a former banker with UBS and Credit Suisse, that Mr. Bagios had aided a federal investigation into tax evasion and Swiss banking practices.
abstract: Former Swiss banker Christos Bagios, previously employed by UBS and Credit Suisse Group, pleads guilty to helping Americans hide millions of dollars from tax authorities; Judge Kenneth Marra notes in sentencing that Bagios aided federal investigation of tax evasion, sentencing him to time served.
lead_paragraph: A judge noted in the sentencing of Christos Bagios, a former banker with UBS and Credit Suisse, that Mr. Bagios had aided a federal investigation into tax evasion and Swiss banking practices.

headline.seo: Christos Bagios, Former Swiss Banker, Pleads Guilty in Tax Evasion Case
headline.main: Ex-Swiss Banker Admits Aid to U.S. Tax Evaders
headline.print_headline: Ex-Swiss Banker Admits Aid to U.S. Tax Evaders
